mapper.update: update ecs_attribute set cat_id = #{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, attr_name = #{attr_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_input_type = #{attr_input_type,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_type = #{attr_type,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_index = #{attr_index,jdbcType=BIT}, sort_order = #{sort_order,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_linked = #{is_linked,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_group = #{attr_group,jdbcType=BIT}, is_attr_gallery = #{is_attr_gallery,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_txm = #{attr_txm,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_values = #{attr_values,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where attr_id = #{attr_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select attr_id, cat_id, attr_name, attr_input_type, attr_type, attr_index, sort_order, is_linked, attr_group, is_attr_gallery, attr_txm, attr_values from ecs_attribute where attr_id = #{attr_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
